name: Heavy Particle Cannon
customPrimary: Hits on hull deal up to %s additional %s damage and EMP in a %s unit cone past the point of impact.

name: Haas Beamer
customPrimary: Beam sweeps across the target area.

name: Chirp PD
customPrimary: Beam sweeps and deals %s energy damage to the first fighter or missile hit.

name: Tarantella PD
customPrimary: Beam sweeps and deals %s energy damage to up to 5 fighters or missiles.

name: Ionic Plasma Decimator
customPrimary: Each time the beam is fired, the first hull hit on a frigate-sized target or larger releases %s EMP arcs across the target, dealing %s energy damage and EMP each.

name: Corrosion Beam
customPrimary: Every %s seconds of hitting shields spawns a %s energy damage projectile.

name: Corrosion Beam (Subprojectile)
customAncillary: Deals up to %s reduced damage to shields if target hard flux is low.

name: Saturation Cannon
customPrimary: Current hardflux level determines the amount of ammo that can be stored, up to %s charges at %s hard flux.

name: Ion Bolter
customPrimary: Projectiles have a wide spread and a small chance to apply a shield-piercing arc.

name: Ion Repeater
customPrimary: Projectiles have a wide spread and a small chance to apply a shield-piercing arc.

name: Pyrokinetic Streamer
customPrimary: Mounting in a %s slot increases range by %s. Mounting in a %s slot adds EMP arc chance and damage on hull and armor hit.
customPrimaryHL: Ballistic, Hybrid, or Universal | 200 | Ballistic, Hybrid, or Universal

name: Discord PPC
customPrimary: Deals %s bonus damage to armor only. If mounted in a %s slot, deals soft flux damage to shields and the armor damage bonus is reduced to %s. Mounting in a %s slot increases range by %s.

name: Trance Super Blaster
customPrimary: Deals up to %s bonus damage based on current flux level (max at %s flux). Hits on hull or armor have a %s chance to arc to weapons and engines, dealing the same damage.

name: Crescendo
customPrimary: Deals up to %s bonus damage based on current flux level (max at %s flux). Hits on hull or armor have a %s chance to arc to weapons and engines, dealing the same damage.

name: AMP Cannon
customPrimary: Hits on hull deal up to %s additional %s damage and EMP in a %s unit cone past the point of impact.

name: Atomic Driver
customPrimary: Damage is heavily reduced by armor, and deals full damage only when passing through center of mass. Mounting in a %s slot increases range by %s.
customAncillary: Does not damage armor and deals soft flux damage to shields.

name: Hardlight Rifle
customPrimary: Successive hull and armor hits within %s seconds deal %s more damage, stacking up to a maximum of %s bonus damage. Switching targets reduces the counter.

name: Stunpulse
customPrimary: Projectiles are attracted to shielded targets and have a chance to arc onhit.

name: Tizona (High Delay)
customPrimary: Projectiles are attracted to shielded targets and have a chance to arc onhit.

name: Pyrowisp System
customPrimary: %s max ammo when mounted in a %s slot.

name: HPF Projector
customPrimary: %s max ammo when mounted in a %s slot. Fires a homing plasma field contained in a spatial anomaly. On hull or armor impact the anomaly merges with the target's microgravity field to reduce mobility by %s for %s seconds. Does not stack.
customAncillary: Deals up to %s reduced damage to shields if target hard flux is low.

name: HPF Array
customPrimary: %s max ammo when mounted in a %s slot. Fires a homing plasma field contained in a spatial anomaly. On hull or armor impact the anomaly merges with the target's microgravity field to reduce mobility by %s for %s seconds. Does not stack.
customAncillary: Deals up to %s reduced damage to shields if target hard flux is low.

name: Heavy Pyrowisp System
customPrimary: %s max ammo when mounted in a %s slot.

name: Flamestrike
customPrimary: %s max ammo when mounted in a %s slot.

name: Wavefront MRM Rack
customPrimary: Emits %s EMP arcs on impact, piercing shields on high-hardflux targets. Each arc deals %s Energy damage and a target can only be hit by up to %s arcs. Adds %s hard flux on hit per arc.

name: Wavefront MRM Pod
customPrimary: Emits %s EMP arcs on impact, piercing shields on high-hardflux targets. Each arc deals %s Energy damage and a target can only be hit by up to %s arcs. Adds %s hard flux on hit per arc.

name: Wavefront MRM
customPrimary: Emits %s EMP arcs on impact, piercing shields on high-hardflux targets. Each arc deals %s Energy damage and a target can only be hit by up to %s arcs. Adds %s hard flux on hit per arc.

name: Corrosion Torpedo
customPrimary: Unleashes a gravitonic vortex when the the warhead breaches containment, dragging nearby ships together and dealing soft-flux Energy damage over time.

name: Corrosion Torpedo Launcher
customPrimary: Unleashes a gravitonic vortex when the the warhead breaches containment, dragging nearby ships together and dealing soft-flux Energy damage over time.
